item.title: Integration tests with testcontainers
item.description: Lately… Not a new thing, but lately I’ve been trying to focus more on testing the behaviour of an application rather than its implementation details. Those details are variable; so our behavioural test (Integration test?) shouldn’t depend on them. For example if our application exposes a RESTful CRUD api, storing the resource into some database – changing the library used to connect to the database and run queries at it, must not change the fact that our application should still behave the same.
